materials_name: photographic paper metallic paper photographic film (photographic materials)
object_work_type: digital prints artists' proofs black-and-white slides
physical_appearance: "The image shows a digital print, an artist's proof, and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. Both the digital print and the artist's proof depict the backs of three women. All of them are wearing headscarfs and shoes. The background of the digital print and the artist's proof show a building. The first level of the building contains running rectangular patterns along its wall. There are numerous cracks along the concrete, above the base of the building. The ground in which the three women are walking on contains numerous stones. It is also uneven. The image on the right shows a slide. It is black-and-white in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame, ""Three Worker"" is stated at the top and ""Tan Lip Seng
creator_1: Tan, Lip Seng, 1942- Tan, Lip Seng
subject_terms_1: A.R.P.S. women (female humans) prints (visual works) proofs (prints by function) slides (photographs)
